name: Crème Brûlée
description: Dessert consisting of a rich custard base topped with a layer of hardened caramelized sugar.

name: Macarons
description: Delicate French cookies made from ground almonds, sugar, and egg whites, often filled with ganache or buttercream.

name: Éclairs
description: A classic French pastry made of choux dough filled with cream and topped with chocoalte icing

name: Choux à la Crème
description: A small pastry made of choux dough filled with cream, often served as a dessert or a snack

name: Profiteroles
description: Small choux pastry balls filled with cream and topped with chocolate sauce

name: Mousse au Chocolat
description: A rich chocolate mousse made with cream and eggs

name: Tarte aux Pommes
description: A traditional French apple tart made with a flaky pastry crust and thinly sliced apples.

name: Opera Cake
description: A multi-layered French cake made with layers of almond sponge cake, coffee buttercream, and chocolate ganache.

name: Crème Caramel
description: A custard dessert with a layer of soft caramel on top
